document.full_text: the head of a nonprofit group against teen pregnancy on wednesday defended the $332,500 his organization paid bristol palin over a two-year period to advocate for sexual abstinence.
document.title: nonprofit defends payment to bristol palin
lines_and_colors: the head of a nonprofit group against teen pregnancy on wednesday defended the $332,500 his organization paid bristol palin over a two-year period to advocate for sexual abstinence.
